description: A frontend HTML file implementing a database visualizer interface with styled components, dynamic data fetching via JavaScript, and interactive UI elements for selecting databases and viewing table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing database entries and loading their table lists.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for the selected database and renders them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data rows into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide or object data.
